title.narrative: Water, Peace and Security Phase II

description.narrative: Global level: Policy makers and practitioners from the 4D community (Defence, Development, Diplomacy, Disaster Preparedness and Response). Country level (where WPS supports dialogue processes): Policy makers and practitioners involved in policy and planning around peacekeeping, peacebuilding, conflict prevention, water management, agriculture, water infrastructure projects, development projects.

Relevant public, private and civil society actors at the global and the regional level recognize the risk of water-induced conflict and take initiatives to mitigate or adapt to the threat of water-induced conflict and to increase water-related cooperation and peacebuilding.

This is phase II of the Water, Peace and Security. International Alert will provide support to the consortium in terms of conflict sensitivity. We will also be directly implementing the dialogue aspect of the project in Mali and Horn of Africa. Furthermore, the project will involve engagement in outreach and advocacy efforts to raise awareness on water related conflicts.
